title: Augmented Reality-Based Gamified Social Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social studies teaching experience and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: A project-based workshop where in-service elementary school teachers experience designing social studies lessons using AR technology and gamification.

learning_goals: Design of one AR social studies content applying the ASER framework (Affective Memory, Interactive Storytelling, Gamification)
Development of a strategy to improve learner engagement by over 20% using AR-based gamification elements
Production of one AR educational scenario integrating multisensory experiences (visual/auditory/tactile)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
